'''spanga''' in [[Telerin]] means "beard". 
==Etymology==
[[Primitive Elvish]] form ''[[spangâ]]'', derived from [[SPÁNAG]]<ref>{{HM|LR}}, [[The Etymologies|Etymologies]] p.387</ref>
==Cognates==
*[[Quenya]] ''[[fanga]]''
*[[Sindarin]] ''[[fang]]''
